Hosea or Osee__10.6__Itself also is carried: : One of the golden calves was given by king Manahem, to Phul, king of the Assyrians, to engage him to stand by him.
Hosea or Osee__10.14__As Salmana was destroyed, by the hou: : Salmana, king of the Midianites, was destroyed by the house, that is, by the followers of him that judged Baal; that is, of Gideon, who threw down the altar of Baal; and was therefore called Jerubaal. See Judges 6 and 8.
